5.text: First Encounter at the Tavern Fight

6.name: Drunkard
6.text: "I'm gonna do it, I'm gonna do it!!"

7.name: Drunkard
7.text:
"What the hell are you doing, you bastard!!
Oraaa!!"

8.name: Guest
8.text: "Ooooo! It's a fight, it's a fight!"

11.name: Erick
11.text:
"It's fine, just leave them be. It's more like
entertainment, after all."

13.name: Erick
13.text:
"Besides, the cost of the broken items will be
split evenly among those who fought, regardless of
the outcome. Just let them do as they please."

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"Ooooo...! I see...!! Then I'll also watch the
spectacle!!"

15.name: Bar owner
15.text:
"Well, you know, it's really a big nuisance for
me. But no one seems to understand that part."

16.name: Narration
16.text:
As I leisurely watched the adventurers' fight, a
corner suddenly erupted into a huge explosion.
Several drunkards were blown away. Then, from the
smoke, a dark-skinned elf looking extremely
indignant and a calm white elf appeared.

17.name: Wayne
17.text:
"Jeez... Do you even know who you're picking a
fight with!? I'll leave a dent of about 10cm in
that face of yours!"

18.name: Seres
18.text: "Wayne, that's enough. It's time to stop."

19.name: Wayne
19.text:
"I won't be satisfied until I make you suffer a
bit more! Look! My ale is almost spilling..."

21.name: Wayne
21.text: "I get it, I get it... So stop glaring at me..."

24.name: Villager
24.text:
"Oh, Sol-chan. You've come at just the right
time."

26.name: Villager
26.text:
"The other day, that guy Uji found a hot spring at
the foot of the village. So, we decided to make an
open-air bath. Would you like to come in, Sol-
chan?"

27.name: Sol
27.text:
"Ohhh...!! A hot spring...!! It's a warm spring,
isn't it...!! The smell of sulfur...!!"

28.name: Sol
28.text:
"I'll give it a try!! I'll call everyone too,
okay?!"

30.name: Sol
30.text: "Ohhh...!! It was an irresistible hot spring..."

31.name: Isk
31.text:
"For me... it's a bit hot, but... just the human
culture... like this... ah... I'm getting a little
excited..."

32.name: Erick
32.text: "Sol-chan, stop teasing that dragon a bit"

34.name: Eni-sensei
34.text:
"....Phew. As expected, baths are wonderful. It
feels like it's healing the fatigue from our
journey."

35.name: Erick
35.text:
"That's right. We've been quite busy lately. It's
nice to be able to relax like this."

36.name: Eni-sensei
36.text:
"We never know when the next threat will strike.
It's important to cultivate our spirits like this
whenever we can."

41.name: Eni-sensei
41.text:
"Perhaps it's just their nature. Definitely.
Probably. I'll make a point not to worry about it.
I have."

44.text: The old man from the magic shop

45.name: Sol
45.text: "Excuse me!! Ohhh... This is the magic shop...!!"

46.name: Grandpa Wizard
46.text:
"Oh, it's rare for a dragon to come to this tower.
Quite an interesting guest, I must say."

47.name: Sol
47.text:
"Nice to meet you, Grandpa! ...Do you live in a
place like this?"

48.name: Grandpa Wizard
48.text:
"Yes, indeed. I may look like this, but I am the
great magician Prestrois. If you need magical
items, feel free to ask."

49.name: Sol
49.text:
"Wow, you're the wizard grandpa!! There are so
many magical items...! Amazing! Oh, this one is
amazing! It's beautiful, isn't it?!"

50.name: Grandpa Wizard
50.text: "Hmmm... (More like a puppy than a dragon...)"

51.name: Grandpa Wizard
51.text:
"Well, if you feel like it, come and visit again.
In exchange for the treasures you've gathered,
I'll give you something."

52.name: Sol
52.text: "Yaaay! Can I take a look around?"
